otherNames: Invaders of the Rokujyoma!?, 六畳間の侵略者！？
synopsis:
Due to his family's financial circumstances, young Koutarou is forced to live in a small apartment (rokujouma) on a budget of 5000 yen a month. On the plus side, he lives rent free, but on the minus side, that is because room 106 of Corona Apartments is cursed.
As it turns out the ghost is a cute young girl, and hijinks ensue when she tries to drive him out. Between the haunting, Koutarou's nosy neighbours, and a self-styled magical girls flying to the unneeded rescue, there is way too much for the impoverished young man to handle.
